details.description:
Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk; Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Small pets welcome No broker fee

Welcome to your new home at 804 Jefferson Ave!
You?ll absolutely love your new, fabulous 1-bedroom home, graced with an array of modern fixtures and finishes as well as a thoughtful split-wing layout. Your 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is a stunning Bed-Stuy rental nestled close to restaurants, grocery stores, bars, and parks. Features of the home include hardwood floors, recessed lighting, casement windows, and in-wall heating and cooling units.
The home opens into a cozy living room and kitchenette. The kitchenette is equipped with a sleek white countertop, a mosaic tile backsplash, lacquer cabinetry, and a suite of stainless steel electric appliances from Blomberg, Frigidaire, LG, and Haier, including a dishwasher and a microwave. Your full bathroom has been upgraded with modern features including a beautiful, mosaic tile wall!
804 Jefferson is located just a quick jaunt away from all of the restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and shops that line Ralph and Patchen Avenues and Malcolm X Boulevard. You will be just a few minutes from Broadway and very close to Reinaldo Salgado Playground and Saratoga Park. The building has an elevator, bicycle storage, a fully-equipped laundry room, a common rooftop deck with gorgeous neighborhood views, and on-site parking at an additional fee. The J and Z subway lines are only a few blocks away.
Schedule your private showing with us today!
July 1 move in Broker fee applies Pets OK for $50/mo

No need to choose between Bushwick and BedStuy with this one! Live right on that line and enjoy one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of and Broadway right outside and Myrtle Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby. Quickly walk to a HUGE grocer (such a luxury in Brooklyn), bars and restaurants galore, and the easiest transportation ever! Conveniently located off the J and M trains as well as the B15, B38, B46, B47, and B54 bus routes. FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Excellent Natural Light! Shared Laundry Room Shared Roof Deck Bike Storage Parking (by availability) Pet Friendly for only $50/month!!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)

Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won't be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!

Act Fast! This fantastic 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment, complete with a private yard, is located in Brooklyn?s vibrant Flatbush-East Flatbush neighborhood. Discover some of Brooklyn?s best architecture with a variety of home styles.
You'll be surrounded by trendy cafes, grocery stores, and local restaurants. The area is well-connected with the 2 and 3 subway lines, numerous bus routes, and it's just a short walk to the beautiful Prospect Park. Enjoy a quick commute to Atlantic Terminal, offering endless transportation options.

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

Overall, it seems like a great option for anyone looking for a spacious and modern living space in Queens.

details.description:
Welcome to 2 Stanwix in Brooklyn, NY! This stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers a spacious and bright living space, perfect for comfortable urban living. Conveniently located just two blocks away from the Myrtle Av Station (J + M + Z) and within half a mile of the Morgan Av Station (L), this newly renovated unit is situated at the border of Bushwick and Williamsburg, offering the best of both vibrant neighborhoods. With its prime location, you can reach Manhattan in just 20 minutes.
Inside the apartment, you'll find modern amenities that enhance your lifestyle. The kitchen features a dishwasher, making meal preparation and cleanup a breeze. Whether you're a foodie or enjoy hosting dinner parties, this convenient appliance adds a touch of convenience to your daily routine.
Furthermore, pet owners will be delighted to know that pets are allowed in the building, making it a welcoming and inclusive community for furry friends. The building itself offers additional amenities to enhance your living experience. Laundry facilities are conveniently located within the building, ensuring you can easily take care of your laundry needs without leaving the premises. Additionally, a virtual doorman service provides an added layer of security and convenience, allowing you to feel safe and secure in your new home.
With its spacious layout, desirable location, and modern amenities, 2 Stanwix 2R/2A is the perfect place to call home for those seeking a comfortable and convenient living experience in Brooklyn, NY.

Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! details.description:
----- Luxury 2 bedroom 1bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

details.description:
----- Luxury STUDIO, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

details.description:
Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.
